problem: If $60$ miles per hour is $88$ feet per second, how many feet per second is $66$ miles per hour? Express your answer as a decimal to the nearest tenth.
solution: We have $60 \text{ miles per hour} = 88 \text{ feet per second}$. Multiplying both sides by $66/60$, we have $66 \text{ miles per hour} = \frac{66}{60} \cdot 88 \text{ feet per second} = \boxed{96.8} \text{ feet per second}$.
